I don't know if this is helpful.
Note: JDWP error slot indicates "INVALID SLOT". (not sure what that means).

INVALID_SLOT means we asked for a valid at an invalid index in the stack frame's 
variable table. http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.
2/docs/guide/jpda/jdwp/jdwp-protocol.html#JDWP_StackFrame_GetValues

Olivier, what VM are you debugging against?
(Umm. "...we asked for a *variable* at an invalid...")
